name: Duceti Snowy Rider
description:
Ride your sports monster motor bike with high speed, around snowy and nice fantastic environment. More thrilling and relaxing with some more drifting your sports bike on highway. Just take your dream sports monster motor bike and do your racing.
This is very basic of racing , rider sports motor circle game
Features:
- Amazing graphics of sports monster motor bike , snowy environment
- Simple controls to control and ride your dream motor circle sport monster on nice snowy environment
- Gas, break buttons to race your racing , rally sports monster motor bike
- Swing your device to control your sports monster motor circle steer
- Automatic gear of your race , rally sports monster motor bike
- Camera button to change your view of racing , rally sports monster motor circle
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PFkozGpwEOA&feature=youtu.be
